glsa.title: GNU Wget: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Wget, the worst of which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Wget. Please review the CVE identifier and bug reports referenced for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU Wget users should upgrade to the latest version:
